name: Juice Inc
description:
Build your very own Juice!

Hire staff, order them to plant trees, pick fruit, juice fruit, pack juice and finally ship the juice.

Make profit, keep the juice flowing!

Controls:

To move the camera use WASD

Use Left Mouse button to interact. Right mouse button to cancel orders.

To zoom in use scroll using the Mouse Wheel

To tilt the camera hold Shift + Scroll Mouse Wheel

Now get to Planting -> Hiring -> Building -> Delivering!

Delivering function didn't make it into the final Game Jam submission project.
